review_title: Not walking the talk of wellbeing in the workplace
pros: Amazing site, strong community, good historical reputation.
cons:
Board and senior leadership out of touch, autocratic and oblivious to diversity and other current workplace trends.
Most staff are no longer recognised for their efforts and are not given a voice in decisions affecting their work, wellbeing or futures. High turnover, even of new incoming recruits.
